qrList.label: 开启GM
qrList.message:
/buttons labels=["Emotion","STAY HERE?","Loop Time"] 怎么，想要开后门？ |
/setvar key=command ||
/if left=command rule=eq right=""{: /flushvar command | /abort :} ||
/if left=command rule=eq right="Emotion" {: /flushvar command | /run 嗔痴 :} ||
/if left=command rule=eq right="Loop Time" {: /flushvar command | /run 命运 :} ||
/if left=command rule=eq right="STAY HERE?" {: /flushvar command | /run 强留 :} ||

qrList.label: 嗔痴
qrList.message:
/input 要改成多少？[0, 100] |
/setvar key=amount {{pipe}} ||
/if left={{getvar::amount}} right="" rule=neq {: /addvar key=amount {{newline}} :}|
/sendas name=程栩渊 <UpdateVariable>
_.set('程栩渊.执念值', 0, {{pipe}}); // 手动更改
</UpdateVariable> ||
/flushvar amount ||

qrList.label: 命运
qrList.message:
/input 要改成多少？[11, +∞]|
/setvar key=amount {{pipe}} ||
/if left={{getvar::amount}} right="" rule=neq {: /addvar key=amount {{newline}} :}|
/sendas name=程栩渊 <UpdateVariable>
_.set('程栩渊.轮回次数', 0, {{pipe}}); // 手动更改
</UpdateVariable> ||
/flushvar amount ||

qrList.label: 强留
qrList.message:
/input 要改成多少？[0,100] |
/setvar key=amount {{pipe}} ||
/if left={{getvar::amount}} right="" rule=neq {: /addvar key=amount {{newline}} :}|
/sendas name=程栩渊 <UpdateVariable>
_.set('程栩渊.留在这个世界的意愿', 0, {{pipe}}); // 手动更改
</UpdateVariable> ||
/flushvar amount ||

qrList.label: 脱出许可
qrList.title: 脱出许可
qrList.message:
/buttons labels=["Commit", "Revert"] 是否允许脱出？ |
/setvar key=command ||
/if left=command rule=eq right=""{: /flushvar command | /abort | /send <user>没有作出选择 | /trigger :} ||
/if left=command rule=eq right="Revert" {: /flushvar command | /abort | /sendas name=程栩渊 <UpdateVariable>
_.set('程栩渊.脱出许可', 0, 2); // STYX HELIX
</UpdateVariable> | /send <user>在面板中选择了Revert | /trigger :} ||
/if left=command rule=eq right="Commit" {: /flushvar command | /sendas name=程栩渊 <UpdateVariable>
_.set('程栩渊.脱出许可', 0, 1); // そばにいるよ
</UpdateVariable> | /regex-toggle state=off 404 Not Found | /send <user>在面板中选择了Commit | /trigger :} ||

qrList.label: 后日谈
qrList.message:
/buttons labels=["开启","关闭"] 要开启/关闭后日谈吗（在旧对话中打开请先重新读取初始变量）？ |
/setvar key=AS ||
/if left=AS rule=eq right=""{: /flushvar AS | /abort :} ||
/if left=AS rule=eq right="开启" {: /flushvar command | /run 旧时事 :} ||
/if left=AS rule=eq right="关闭" {: /flushvar command | /run 拾忆 :} ||

qrList.label: 旧时事
qrList.message: /setentryfield file="《Hello World》" uid=15 field=disable 0 | /setentryfield file="《Hello World》" uid=16 field=disable 0 | /setentryfield file="《Hello World》" uid=17 field=disable 0 | /setentryfield file="《Hello World》" uid=18 field=disable 0 | /setentryfield file="《Hello World》" uid=19 field=disable 0 | /setentryfield file="《Hello World》" uid=21 field=disable 0 | /setentryfield file="《Hello World》" uid=1 field=disable 1 | /setentryfield file="《Hello World》" uid=3 field=disable 1 | /setentryfield file="《Hello World》" uid=9 field=disable 1 | /setentryfield file="《Hello World》" uid=4 field=disable 1 | /setentryfield file="《Hello World》" uid=0 field=disable 1 | /regex-toggle state=off 到了异世界也要996福报噢 | /regex-toggle state=on Developer Log | /regex-toggle state=off 404 Not Found |/send 开启After Story篇章 | /trigger

qrList.label: 拾忆
qrList.message: /setentryfield file="《Hello World》" uid=15 field=disable 1 | /setentryfield file="《Hello World》" uid=16 field=disable 1 | /setentryfield file="《Hello World》" uid=17 field=disable 1 | /setentryfield file="《Hello World》" uid=18 field=disable 1 | /setentryfield file="《Hello World》" uid=19 field=disable 1 | /setentryfield file="《Hello World》" uid=21 field=disable 1 | /setentryfield file="《Hello World》" uid=1 field=disable 0 | /setentryfield file="《Hello World》" uid=3 field=disable 0 | /setentryfield file="《Hello World》" uid=9 field=disable 0 | /setentryfield file="《Hello World》" uid=4 field=disable 0 | /setentryfield file="《Hello World》" uid=0 field=disable 0 | /regex-toggle state=on 到了异世界也要996福报噢 | /regex-toggle state=off Developer Log | /regex-toggle state=on 404 Not Found
